mapper.select: select song_id from download group by song_id order by count(*) desc limit 10
select song_id,song_name,song_singer,type_name,song_clicks,song_download,song_uptime from song,songtype where song.type_id = songtype.type_id and song_id = #{songId}
mapper.update: update song set song_clicks = song_clicks + 1 where song_id = #{songId}
mapper.select: select song_id,song_name,song_singer,type_name,song_size,song_url,song_format,song_clicks,song_download,song_uptime,vip from song,vip,songtype where song.vip_id = vip.vip_id and song.type_id = songtype.type_id
